articles.author: David Phelan
articles.title: Apple iPhone 16 Pro To Boast Record-Breaking Design, Leak Claims - Forbes
articles.description: Exactly what the next brace of iPhones will look like is becoming clearer, and a new report suggests it will include a world first in its design.
articles.content: The next iPhones will have a different look when they are released this September, it seems. From different displays on some models, to a new strategy for its new-generation processors, more advanced… [+3706 chars]

articles.author: Patrick Wingrove
articles.title: Britain considers offering Lilly weight-loss drug on better terms than Wegovy - Reuters
articles.description: Britain's medical costs regulator on Tuesday recommended Eli Lilly's weight-loss drug Mounjaro for some patients with obesity and suggested not placing a time limit on the medicine's use as it had for rival Novo Nordisk's Wegovy.
